reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major arthropathies: osteoarthritis (~600-800 per 100k), rheumatoid arthritis (~30-50 per 100k), other inflammatory arthropathies (~100-150 per 100k), infectious arthritis (~50 per 100k), gouty arthritis (~100 per 100k). Estimated aggregate ~1000 per 100k annually. Low confidence due to heterogeneity and difficulty in obtaining consistent global incidence data across regions.
